tips.quote: Are you having fun? Dont forget ~ for even more fun!
tips.author: Sun Tzu

tips.quote: Need something and can't get it right away? Consider spawning it yourself.
tips.author: Sun Tzu

tips.quote: Why go around when you can just delete your way forward.
tips.author: Sun Tzu

tips.quote: Something take a bit long to complete? If only time could be scaled.
tips.author: Sun Tzu
